ISSUE.TITLE: Add "GuestCustomer" property "CustomerLoggedinEvent"
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Currently, `CustomerLoggedinEvent` only contains the logged-in customer object. Adding a `GuestCustomer` field will give developers more flexibility to migrate data from plugins using the event. [CustomerRegistrationService Line 449](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/81391464ab0f7f81398f992366236cb11b1ed765/src/Libraries/Nop.Services/Customers/CustomerRegistrationService.cs#L449)
